maya.text: Your oil pressure was high last run. Bring it by.
Found a part you might like. Rare intake manifold from a '97 Sakura.
Your brake pads are at 30%. Don't push it.

replies.text: They'll last a few more runs.

maya.text: Someone brought in a turbo kit today. Thinking of you.

replies.text: Is it compatible with the Sakura?

maya.text: Your exhaust is rattling. I can hear it from inside the shop. Bring it in.
Slow night at the shop. Working on a personal project. Remind me to show you later.
A customer asked about you today. Word's spreading.

replies.text: Tell them I'm available for autographs.

maya.text: Just rebuilt your alternator. No charge. Consider it an investment.

replies.text: Maya, you don't have to do that.
I'll pay you back in wins.

maya.text: Your alignment is off by 2 degrees. I noticed during the last tune. Stop by.

replies.text: I was wondering why it pulled left.

nikko.text: Saw your time on the board. Not bad.

replies.text: Not bad? I set the record.

nikko.text: New tires. New setup. You won't recognize my car next time we race.
There's a drift run happening at the harbor tonight. You in?

replies.text: Only if you're buying ramen after.

nikko.text: Watched your replay three times. Your entry into turn 6 is sloppy.

replies.text: You watched my replay THREE times?

nikko.text: Can't sleep. Want to do midnight laps?

replies.text: Meet you at the usual spot.
Only if we get coffee first.

nikko.text: My mechanic said my car is faster than yours now. Objectively.

replies.text: Speed doesn't win races. Drivers do.
Then why do I keep winning?

diesel.text: The mountain doesn't care about your feelings.
You're overdriving. Slow down to go faster.

replies.text: That makes no sense. And also perfect sense.

diesel.text: The engine is a heart. Treat it like one.
I drove your route today. You're leaving time on the table in sector 2.
The road forgives those who listen.
Early morning run tomorrow. Harbor route. Meet at 5.
There is no shortcut to mastery.
Watched you from the bridge last night. Your cornering has improved.

jade.text: Apex is monitoring your performance metrics. Keep them trending upward.
Professional racing update: the qualifying window opens next week. I've registered you.
Event tomorrow. Dress code: smart casual. Try to look presentable.

replies.text: I'll be in my racing suit.

jade.text: Your social media presence could use work. Consider posting more. The sponsors pay attention.

replies.text: I'll try to be more active.

jade.text: A potential sponsor wants to meet. Dinner Thursday. Wear something nice.
Off the record: how are you really doing? I know this world can be overwhelming.

replies.text: It's a lot. But I'm handling it.

unknown.text: Do you ever feel like someone is watching you drive?
The city has a rhythm. Have you found yours yet?
Some races can't be won. Some can't be lost. Know the difference.
The underground has eyes. And a long memory.
There are those who race for money. Those who race for fame. And those who race because they have no choice.
01:00. Harbor District. Flash your lights twice. Or don't. Your choice.

echo.text: Zero asked about you today. That's unusual.
The circles within circles run deeper than you know.
Trust is a luxury in this world. Spend it wisely.
Have you ever wondered why they call it 'underground'? Not because it's hidden. Because it's the foundation.
Zero never texts directly. That's what I'm for. Consider me the filter between you and something much larger.
